method: {"conversion_factor_sec_hydrogen": "value from literature source for 2020 for RWGS to CO and added the H2 needed to obtain a syngas ratio of 2:1 H2/CO by calculating the energy content ratio of 2:1 molar fraction syngas (=1.70768 PJ H2 per PJ CO)", "conversion_factor_sec_heat_high": "literature value", "conversion_factor_sec_elec": "literature value", "conversion_factor_emi_co2_reusable": "literature value in Mton_CO2/PJ_CO converted to t_CO2/MWh", "cost_inv_p": "from source assumed based on value for 2016 (5 Mio. €/PJ with conversion from M€/PJ to €/MW and the assumption of 8000 operating hours per year, the year of € is 2015 therefore inflation is accounted for this value) and additionally conversion from €/MW_CO to €/MW_syngas by multiplying the value with the ratio between the LHV of syngas and the LHV of carbon monoxide", "cost_fix_p": "cost_inv_p multiplied with literature value for operational costs in %_CAPEX which was 0.03", "lifetime": "own assumption", "wacc": ""}
